review_blob: Bottle to pint glass. Hazy honey color, very thin cream head. Faint flower and fruit nose. Very good flavor, hints of sake and berries.
Can to snifter glass. Cooper color with off white thick had. Floral aroma. Notes of grapefruit and pine taste. Not for the faint of heart. Bitter, hoppy and delicious.
beer_name: Oskar Blues Deviant Dales India Pale Ale

review_blob: Bottle to tulip glass. Dark amber color, small white head. Citrusy, floral nose. Hints of grapefruit and hoppy taste.
Bottle, tulip glass. I love Fantasy Brewmasters concept. Poured a dark amber color. Aroma and palate rich with roasted malts.
Draft. Poured a pretty golden amber with a thick white head. Flowery aroma and hoppy taste.
